imdb.plot outline: An exciting series of in-depth interviews with inspiring Turkish women, "Women of Turkey" explores the lives of extraordinary women. Be it an acclaimed artist, a world class businesswoman or a school teacher from a small village, women from all walks of life share their personal stories.
imdb.title: Women of Turkey
plot: An exciting series of in-depth interviews with inspiring Turkish women, "_Women of Turkey_ (qv)" explores the lives of extraordinary women. Be it an acclaimed artist, a world class businesswoman or a school teacher from a small village, women from all walks of life share their personal stories.::Beril Elhadef (Producer/Presenter)
